Articles.Content:
Hi, i got a small bug with grass colours on kerbin the grass seems off and darken than ksc grass and it persists in flight scene and in orbit.

Here is the picture:

This happens depending on your video graphics settings. I have mine turned down to minimum without any hardware acceleration (because my computer doesn't have any graphics cards) and it does look very similar to what you are displaying.
So how do i fix it?
You'll have to adjust your graphics settings when you run the game under "Settings" in the main menu and adjust the game to fit your graphics capability.
i tried every thing, still dark as night
Check the SM3 Terrain shaders box in graphics settings. Be warned if you have an average system it will take a hit.
I tried having it turned off and on, in both cases it didn't work
